testcase.classname: Navigate to lexisNexis UK WebSite and check for options availability
testcase.name: validate the availability of Risk Decision Making Features
testcase.system-out: Then check and click on FinancialServices option............................passed And wait for some time and navigate back to the home page to click on Insurance.passed Then check and click on Insurance option....................................passed And wait for some time and navigate back to the home page to click on LifeandPensions.passed Then check and click on LifeandPensions option..............................passed And wait for some time and navigate back to the home page to click on CorporationsandNonProfits.passed Then check and click on LifeandPensions CorporationsandNonProfits...........passed And scrollDown to click FinancialServices in chooseIndustryTab..............passed Then click on FinancialCrimeCompliance......................................passed And navigate to chooseindustry and click on FraudAndIdentityManagement......passed Then navigate to chooseindustry and click on CustomerDataManagement.........passed And navigate to chooseindustry and click on CreditRiskAssesment.............passed Then navigate to chooseindustry and click on CollectionsAndRecovery.........passed And navigate to chooseindustry and click on TracingAndInvestigations........passed
